Function:

drawRotateText

Description:

绘制旋转文字。Draws rotated text at a specified point with a given rotation angle. The function uses canvas transformation to rotate the text around the specified rotation point, then restores the original canvas state.

Returns:

This function does not return a value

Example:
// Basic rotated text
const canvas = document.getElementById('myCanvas');
const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
ctx.font = '16px Arial';
ctx.fillStyle = '#333333';
drawRotateText(ctx, { x: 100, y: 100 }, 45, 'Rotated Text');
Example:
// Creating rotated labels for chart axes
const labels = ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr'];
labels.forEach((label, index) => {
  const x = 50 + index * 40;
  const y = 200;
  drawRotateText(ctx, { x, y }, -45, label);
});
Example:
// Rotating numeric values
ctx.font = '14px monospace';
ctx.fillStyle = '#0066cc';
drawRotateText(ctx, { x: 150, y: 150 }, 90, 42.5);
